title: Left click won't show status/health of anything and won't respond to the (default) v ping
body: Ever since the patch (not official patch, just my game updated) that occurred about 2-3 days ago, I have been unable to use my left click for common necessities such as seeing the health of a unit and pinging. Note: I have messed with my input.ini file to try to put my left click as attack move to no avail, but since it has stopped working I have restored my keybindings to default, repaired my files, and even deleted the input.ini file so that the game could make a new one with all having no effect . Would I have to reinstall my game in order to fix this?

replies.body:
Did you delete the *persistedsettings.json* file in addition to the *input.ini* while logged into the League client? This is the only true way to reset your files and have the system create a fresh set for you. Alternatively, (if you don't use item sets) you can just delete the entire **Config** folder while logged into the client, then hop into a custom match to confirm the change went through.

I hope this helped.

Sorry for the late reply -- been busy with school, but thanks for the help! All the forums I read didn't mention another file besides  _input.ini_ so this really helped! Thanks a lot! (BTW the new client looks great too!)
